it.prisma.monitoringpillar

Class PillarServiceWS

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.prisma.monitoringpillar.PillarServiceWS

  • @Path(value="/pillar")
public class PillarServiceWS
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    m.grandolfo

    Exposes RESTful API that wrap Monitoring products' API such as Zabbix's ones

    • Method Detail

      • getMonitoringIaaSPillar

        @Path(value="/prisma-services")
@POST
@Produces(value="application/json")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public java.lang.Object getMonitoringIaaSPillar(java.lang.String requestBody)
                                         throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException,
                                                com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException,
                                                java.io.IOException
        Method useful for:
        • creating a host to be monitored
        Parameters:
        bodyRequest -
        JSON String with the body request
        {
        POST: "http:///monitoring/prisma-services/",
        {
        "testbed-type":"infn",
        "action-type":"create_monitored_host",
        "parameters":{
        "vmuuid": "6ad90238-9a82-4235-bb90-e0bd2aed627b",
        "vmip":"",
        "service-category":"",
        "tag-service":"",
        "service-type":[""]
        },
        "adapter-type":"zabbix"
        }
        @return the ID belonging to the cancelled host


      • deleting a monitored host
        bodyRequest -
        JSON String with the body request
        {
        POST: "http:///monitoring/prisma-services/",
        {
        "testbed-type":"infn",
        "action-type":"delete_monitored_host",
        "parameters":{
        "vmuuid": "6ad90238-9a82-4235-bb90-e0bd2aed627b",
        },
        "adapter-type":"zabbix"
        }
        @return the ID belonging to the cancelled host


      • getting IaaS'status by verifying that all Openstack processes are answering correctly
        bodyRequest -
        JSON String with the body request
        {
        POST: "http:///monitoring/prisma-services/",
        {
        "testbed-type":"infn",
        "action-type":"iaas_status",
        "parameters":{
        "vmname": "6ad90238-9a82-4235-bb90-e0bd2aed627b",
        },
        "adapter-type":"zabbix"
        }
        @return A zabbix-like response whose "lastvalue" field gives the right information about number of compute nodes working and the correctness of the answer coming from openstack processes of interest such as:
        1. Keystone
        2. Nova
        3. Cinder
        4. Neutron
        5. Glance
        6. Swift


      • getting Metrics of Infrastructure related to a specific Virtual Machine just deployed This API has been tought in order to give the capability of requesting these metrics one by one because of their importance. Indeed they are going to be used to build graphs on the UI upon user's request
        bodyRequest -
        JSON String with the body request
        {
        POST: "http:///monitoring/prisma-services/",
        {
        "testbed-type":"infn",
        "action-type":"metric_iaas",
        "parameters":{
        "vmuuid": "f739ea3b-a900-462f-9d27-8042020ba2a8",
        "uptime":false,
        "storage":false,
        "networkin":false,
        "networkout":false,
        "memory":true,
        "cpuload":false
        },
        "adapter-type":"zabbix"
        }
        @return A zabbix-like response whose "lastvalue" field gives the right information about the specific metric requested. An external scritp is in charge of asking ceilometer API about the specific metric


      • getting Metrics of Specific atomic PaaS service of a just deployed machine in order to make sure the host is up and deploying workflow can proceed further and smooth
        bodyRequest -
        JSON String with the body request
        {
        POST: "http:///monitoring/prisma-services/",
        {
        "testbed-type":"infn",
        "action-type":"metric_paas",
        "parameters":{
        "vmuuid": "f739ea3b-a900-462f-9d27-8042020ba2a8",
        "jboss":false,
        "tomcat":true,
        "apache":false,
        "mysql":false,
        "postgresql":false,
        "rabbitmq":false,
        "x2goserver":false,
        "vmaas":false
        },
        "adapter-type":"zabbix"
        }
        @return a zabbix-like response whose lastvalue is the actual value of the requested metric upon which the calling consuming code will take its actions


      • getting Triggers of Specific metric belonging to a specific atomic PaaS service of a just deployed machine. This other check is necessary for a crossed check in order to determine whether a host is effectively up and running or still deploying
        bodyRequest -
        JSON String with the body request
        {
        POST: "http:///monitoring/prisma-services/",
        {
        "testbed-type":"infn",
        "action-type":"trigger_paas",
        "parameters":{
        "vmuuid": "f739ea3b-a900-462f-9d27-8042020ba2a8",
        "jboss":false,
        "tomcat":true,
        "apache":false,
        "mysql":false,
        "postgresql":false,
        "rabbitmq":false,
        "x2goserver":false,
        "vmaas":false
        },
        "adapter-type":"zabbix"
        }
        @return a zabbix-like response whose lastvalue is the actual value of the requested trigger upon which the calling consuming code will take its actions


      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException
      java.io.IOException

    • getIaaSInfo

      @Path(value="/prisma-services/testbed/{testbed_id}/adapter/{adapter}/iaas/")
@GET
@Produces(value="application/json")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public it.prisma.domain.dsl.monitoring.iaas.MonitoringWrappedResponseIaasV2 getIaaSInfo(@PathParam(value="testbed_id")
                                                                                                          java.lang.String testbed_id,
                                                                                                          @PathParam(value="adapter")
                                                                                                          java.lang.String adapter,
                                                                                                          @QueryParam(value="iaasType")
                                                                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> iaasType)
                                                                                 throws org.hibernate.MappingException,
                                                                                        it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.apiclients.prisma.APIErrorException,
                                                                                        it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.apiencoding.NoMappingModelFoundException,
                                                                                        it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.apiencoding.ServerErrorResponseException,
                                                                                        it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.restclient.exceptions.RestClientException,
                                                                                        java.lang.Exception
      Method that wraps Zabbix API in order to provide info about the gruop containing all the monitored hosts, the metrics associated to themselves, as well as trigger. The API consumer will be able to take actions based on the metrics and triggers' actual values. All this coming from a specific testbed, zabbix server (in this case zabbic iaas) and adapter.
      Parameters:
      testbed_id -
      adapter -
      iaasType -
      Returns:
      Monitoring Wrapped Response Iaas. Gives the picture of the entire group requested such as the group of Compute node redundated
      Throws:
      org.hibernate.MappingException
      it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.apiclients.prisma.APIErrorException
      it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.apiencoding.NoMappingModelFoundException
      it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.apiencoding.ServerErrorResponseException
      it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.restclient.exceptions.RestClientException
      java.lang.Exception

      In Prisma PaaS context there are category services such as DBaaS, AppaaS, etc. created by a specific user. Here the API consumer might be interested in having a picture of the general situation into a category Service group
      Parameters:
      testbed_id -
      adapter -
      service_category_id -
      Returns:
      MonitoringWrappedResponsePaaS Object that wraps Zabbix APIs in order to give needed information about a host, service category, atomic services, metrics, triggers

    • getTaggedService

      @Path(value="/prisma-services/testbed/{testbed_id}/adapter/{adapter}/paas/service_category/{service_category_id}/tag_service/{tag_service}")
@GET
@Produces(value="application/json")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public it.prisma.domain.dsl.monitoring.paas.MonitoringWrappedResponsePaaSV2 getTaggedService(@PathParam(value="testbed_id")
                                                                                                               java.lang.String testbed_id,
                                                                                                               @PathParam(value="adapter")
                                                                                                               java.lang.String adapter,
                                                                                                               @PathParam(value="service_category_id")
                                                                                                               java.lang.String service_category_id,
                                                                                                               @PathParam(value="tag_service")
                                                                                                               java.lang.String tag_service)
      A deployed service might be composed of two or more machines, so that it's needed to call those hosts belonging to the category by searching them by the serviceID attached to themselves at the creation stage. It retrieves all hosts belonging to a specific ATOMIC Service (properly tagged since the creation of it) created by the user.
      Parameters:
      testbeds_id -
      host_id -
      service_category_id -
      atomic_service_id -
      metrics_id -
      triggers_id -
      Returns:
      MonitoringWrappedResponsePaaS Object that wraps Zabbix APIs in order to give needed information about a host, service category, atomic services, metrics, triggers
      Throws:
      org.hibernate.MappingException
      it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.apiclients.prisma.APIErrorException
      it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.apiencoding.NoMappingModelFoundException
      it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.apiencoding.ServerErrorResponseException
      it.prisma.utils.web.ws.rest.restclient.exceptions.RestClientException
